scripts.build:libs: npm run build --workspace=@devflow/core && npm run build --workspace=@devflow/navigation && npm run build --workspace=@devflow/motion && npm run build --workspace=@devflow/shell
scripts.dev: npm run build:libs && concurrently "npm run dev:client" "npm run dev:server"
scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix client && npm install --prefix server
scripts.build:all: npm run build:libs && npm run build --prefix client && npm run build --prefix server
